items.translated_title: Uber to buy delivery arm of Turkey’s Getir
items.content: The deal will see Uber paying $335 million at the outset to purchase Getir's food delivery business. Uber will also pay $100 million for a 15% stake in Getir's grocery, retail, and water delivery business.
